CREATE TABLE production (
    production_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    energy_source VARCHAR(255),
    energy_output DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE allocation (
    allocation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    production_id INT REFERENCES production(production_id),
    allocation_date DATE,
    allocated_amount DECIMAL
);

### STATEMENT

SELECT production.production_id, production.energy_output, COUNT(allocation.allocation_id) AS num_allocations FROM production LEFT JOIN allocation ON production.production_id = allocation.production_id GROUP BY production.production_id HAVING num_allocations > 0
